title: New Game Mode
body: There should be a game mode where the shop has every single item that's on Summoners Rift, also from Twisted Treeline, Crystal Scar and ARAM plus every single item that has existed in the past but has been removed so we can mix up a lot of unique builds to play with :)

replies.body: That would be broken as. ADC's would reign in terror with IE and new Lord Van Dam's Pillager, as well as the junglers. Devourer plus Feral Flare would be OP.
But it's only fair seeing as both teams can use the same items and having a ban on 3 champs would make it a bit easier

Maybe, but I really don't like game modes where only one class of champion reigns above the rest. The only thing that would be cool is that you could have both Wooglet's Witchcap and Zhonya's stasis together. That would be funny
Maybe they would make it so only one of those items would be able to use the ability and tanks would be able to counter adc's
